text: Dietmar Lorenz (23 September 1950 â€“ 8 September 2021) was an East German judoka. He competed for SC Dynamo Hoppegarten under the Sportvereinigung Dynamo. He was born in the German village of Langenbuch. Lorenz won a gold and bronze medal at the 1980 Summer Olympics. Lorenz died on 8 September 2021, aged 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for East Germany Category:Judoka Category:Olympic gold medalists for East Germany
title: Dietmar Lorenz
